org.xlattice.protocol.stun

Class BindingSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.xlattice.protocol.stun.BindingSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BindingSender
extends java.lang.Thread
    A BindingSender manages a queue of outgoing messages, sending each from its address/port combination to the desired target. The four BindingServers can dispatch outgoing messages to any of the four BindingSenders.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
